text: aur hamaare lie is sansaar mein bhalaee likh de aur aakhirat mein bhee. ham teree hee or unmukh hue." usane kaha, "apanee yaatana mein main to usee ko grast karata hoon, jise chaahata hoon, kintu meree dayaaluta se har cheez aachchhaadit hai. use to main un logon ke haq mein likhoonga jo dar rakhate aur zakaat dete hai aur jo hamaaree aayaton par eemaan laate hai
